result.text: MERRILLVILLE, Ind.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) (NiSource, we and our) announced today that it has established an at-the-market equity offering program under which NiSource may sell shares of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share (Common Stock), having an aggregate gross sales price of up to $1.5 billion through December 31, 2028 (the Offering).
